== What's new in Maverick ==
* IRC Meeting after every milestone <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoTest/Riunioni]]</nowiki>
* Testcases coverage verification in every Meeting. (Example: <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/PaoloSammicheli/Prove2]]</nowiki>
* Membership expiration after 2 missed milestone
* Mentoring in IRC Channel by a '''steering committee''' made by people who already made a full cycle and available to stay on the channel
** '''steering committee''' is in charge for writing and maintain a FAQ (not released yet) for new members
